title: Department of Biomedical Engineering
bannerCon: Integrating engineering principles with biomedical sciences to advance research, education, and healthcare technologies.

items.subTitle: Overview
items.contents: Biomedical Engineering is a multidisciplinary field that integrates biology and engineering and applying engineering principles to healthcare. Biomedical Engineering is a relatively newly introduced branch of Engineering. The demand of Biomedical Engineers is growing as it helps to address the gap of medical and engineering to develop quality health care products.Department of Biomedical Engineering was established in the year 2016. Department Biomedical Engineering has well qualified and dedicated faculty members engaged in research and development. The Department has established the Center for Biophotonics and technology to promote inhouse research activities among students and faculty members. Young department to receive grants from Department of Science and Technology, Delhi. Our department holds the track record of providing 85-90 % placement and facilitates students to start their startups for developing biomedical devices.

items.subTitle: Vision
content: To be a nationally recognized biomedical engineering department for disseminating knowledge, healthcare training and developing indigenous products useful to the society.

items.subTitle: Mission
content: To facilitate learners with recent trends in biomedical engineering with emphasis on core specialization through updated curricula and effective teaching learning methods.
To encourage students to take up higher studies, entrepreneurship and involve in translational research leading to patents, publications and products.
To instill professionalism, ethical and social values among the learners through their contribution to biomedical engineering in their chosen career.

basic.title: Faculty
basic.description: The faculty of the Department of Biomedical Engineering comprises experienced academicians and interdisciplinary researchers committed to excellence in teaching, research, and innovation. They integrate engineering principles with medical and biological sciences to mentor students in developing technologies that advance healthcare, diagnostics, and biomedical applications.

items.title: Laboratory Facilities:
items.desc: Department of Biomedical Engineering have well equipped laboratories which are used for academic, research established projects.
content: Department of BME believes in imparting strong practical exposure to students.
Maintains its specialized labs, equipped with modern equipment of industry standards.
The Department of BME keeps upgrading the facilities and equipment in the laboratories to the latest industry standards, from time to time.
Proceedings : 22
